metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12616 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
When using a VirtualDirContext with Apache Tomcat 7.0.0 to 7.0.80 it was possible to bypass security constraints and/or view the source code of JSPs for resources served by the VirtualDirContext using a specially crafted request.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12616` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libservlet3.1-java - 8.5.30-1ubuntu1
libtomcat8-embed-java - 8.5.30-1ubuntu1
libtomcat8-java - 8.5.30-1ubuntu1
tomcat8 - 8.5.30-1ubuntu1
tomcat8-admin - 8.5.30-1ubuntu1
tomcat8-common - 8.5.30-1ubuntu1
tomcat8-examples - 8.5.30-1ubuntu1
tomcat8-user - 8.5.30-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this commit is included in commit list for CVE-2017-12617

criterions.comment: tomcat7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
tomcat8 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.5.30-1ubuntu1').
